name: product_fulfillment
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool target_com_shopping_api.
Tool description: Realtime APIs support entire shopping flow on Target.com.
(Free trial enabled)

API description: Fetches product fulfillment information from Target's API based on provided parameters.

tcin.description:
Target product id.
Value comes from product search API.

accept.description: Content types that are acceptable for the response (default is 'application/json').

accept_language.description: List of acceptable languages for the response (default is 'en-US,en;q=0.9').

zip.description: The zipcode of the user's search location (default is '94611').

state.description: State code of the user's location (default is 'CA').

store_id.description:
The id of the Target store from which the fulfillment information is being retrieved.
Value comes from nearby stores api.
(optional)
